resources.string: You are offline; data may be out of date.
We were unable to reach the servers to load the latest information. Check your internet connection and try again.
It looks like this event hasn\'t posted any results recently. It\'s possible that the internet connection at this event is down. The event\'s information might be out of date.
We rely on FIRST to provide scores, ranking, and more. Unfortunately, FIRST\'s servers are broken right now, so we can\'t get the latest updates. The information you see here may be out of date.
